overview: During the large-scale performance, which was postponed twice due to the epidemic, 28 songs were performed, from the oldest Bonanza songs to the songs of the latest middle album entitled AZ UTOLSÓ BÉKEÉV. The event is immortalized by an impressive concert film on DVD: the publication contains all the songs of the performance with three sound standards (stereo, DD 5.1 and DTS) and subtitles, and the DVD also includes an exciting feature film about the preparations, in which the band and members of the technical team will also speak.
title: Ákos: Több Nem Is Kell
